PolyPharma.configs module¶

created:12 mai 2013
@author:Andrei Kucharavy

Holds all the configurations of the environmental variables for the whole project

class PolyPharma.configs.Dumps[source]¶

Bases: object

A class that contains and controls all the dumps related to accelerated loading of mappings between the graph DB and the mapping matrix holders
